body.name: Cold Brew Mason Coffee Maker - 64oz Iced Coffee Pitcher with Stainless Steel Mixing Spoon & Super Dense Filter 3 Steps Finish Cold Brew Coffee, Classic BPA Free Sturdy Mason jar Pitcher Easy to Clean
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 33 mins
FREE pickup Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 33 mins
features: [3 Steps Save 2000$]: Included in the package is a mixing spoon and instructions to help make it easier! With just 3 steps make cold brew coffee; By using our pitcher jar make your own high-quality cold brew coffee; Save $2,000 per year if you have one cup of coffee daily; It's a nice way to enjoy a favorite drink while keeping more money in your wallet

[Durable Material]: Cold brew pitcher lids are made of food-grade plastic material and jars are made of soda lime glass which is very strong and not easy to crack; Non-toxic & BPA Free (Note: glass is not suitable for extreme temperature changes, so avoid direct hot-to-cold transfers)

[2 Ways Easy to Clean]: All accessories could be removed and put in the dishwasher for cleaning; Hand washing is also very easy, the filter does not require a brush, just rinse with water to clean the coffee grounds; Jrssae cold brew coffee maker easy to clean with no inaccessible areas

[Super Dense Filter]: Food-grade stainless steel conical filter; 160-micron weave makes the filter taste silkier and retains the aromatic oils in the coffee beans; The conical design makes the maximum area of contact between coffee powder and water, and the silicone ring allows you to shake the mason jar pitcher at will to ensure there is no leakage

[User-friendly Design]: The spout design makes pouring liquids easier, while the flip-top lid stays securely in place when pouring water without any wobbling; Easily handle design to take the large 64oz jar with just one hand; Perfect size to fit at home refrigerator door, and the jar even has a scale on it, making it a breeze to measure ingredients for our favorite drinks
body.description: LIFETIME WARRANTY ON ALL PARTS How to Make Cold Brew Coffee with Jrssae Mason Pitcher Jar Ingredients:Coarsely ground coffee beansCold waterOptional: Milk, sweeteners, or flavorings of your choiceInstructions:1.Measure out the desired amount of coffee grounds. A general ratio is 1 part coffee to 4 parts water, but you can adjust it to your taste preferences.If you want a lighter taste you can adjust the ratio of coffee powder to water to 1:8.2.Grind the coffee beans to a coarse consistency. This helps in extracting the flavors without any bitterness.3.Pour the coffee powder into our filter, then slowly pour the pure water into the jar and mix, making full contact between coffee powder and water.4.Put in the refrigerator for 12 hours.5.Remove the filter.Dilute the concentrate with cold water, according to your preference. You can start with equal parts concentrate and water, and adjust it based on how strong you like your coffee.6.Add ice cubes to a glass and pour the cold brew coffee over the ice. If desired, add milk, sweeteners, or any other flavorings to customize your cold brew coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I've been following the protein coffee trend on social media and wanted to give it a try. This was really easy to use and simple to make fresh cold brew coffee. I used flavored ground coffee and it tastes really good the next day. I was also expecting the coffee grounds to come out a big mess from the filter, and I was wrong. It came out it one clump and was fairly clean.Good quality!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cold brew coffee!
reviews.reviewText: This is easy to use and is saving me a ton of money. Cold brew has got so expensive and this is a great alternative. Also, I needed to cut back on my caffeine, so now I can use half organic decaf to cut the caffeine back. I've never seen lower caffeine cold brew on the shelf at the grocery store, so this is a win- win!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and great price
reviews.reviewText: I was very happy with this product. It wasn’t that expensive and works very well. It is a simple design and it allows great cold brew. I enjoy using Death Wish coffee with it. It has a hint of chocolate which comes through beautifully while there is no acidity because the cold brewing method.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coffee Lovers Pure Pleasure!
reviews.reviewText: As a coffee lover, when I first heard about "Cold Brew" I knew I'd want to try that. I reviewed a lot of options but something that is easy to clean and that's long-lasting, with a stainless steel filter that could be quickly rinsed and cleaned out and that it was reasonably priced is what sold me on this Cold Brew Mason Coffee Maker. Good reviews helped too =)I read the documentation, researched on the net and then I was Ready to get started! I let mine sit out for 18 hours overnight and it's plenty dark, strong/full flavor, I noticed that there wasn't any bitterness and it is deeeeeeeelish with Italian Sweet Cream or your favorite liquid coffee creamer over ice! I prefer iced on hot days but it's good any time. I bought the 64-ounce size and found it fit well in our refrigerator without causing overcrowding. Since I am the only one that drinks it, it lasted quite a while. I'm giving serious consideration to buying the smaller one as well. Great product, fast shipping/delivery and I highly recommend this to any cold brew coffee lover OR those who merely want to try it. ~ Enjoy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using cheesecloth for my cold brew before I got this. This is so much easier and less messy. The only concern I have is that the handle does not feel sturdy. It is plastic and bends when using. I remind my husband not to hold it by the handle because it feels like it is going to snap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice design and great quality
reviews.reviewText: This is really beautiful. It was a gift for my husband for Christmas and he was really excited to receive it. It's a good size (32 oz) and the design will work well in our refrigerator. It's sturdy and doesn't seem like it will break easily. The stainless steel parts are stamped and the quality appears to be excellent as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got tired of paying Starbucks prices, so I finally ordered this! Absolutely love this!! Easy to use with my favorite coffee. Easy to clean. I am so pleased with this purchase (and think of the money I save)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I AM SAVING SO MUCH MONEY
reviews.reviewText: It’s ridiculous! This cold brew maker and pitcher is so nice!It makes about 6 cups of cold brew, and if you make sure to follow the instructions to get the best results, you wind up with an amazingly rich and strong cold brew coffee!I make a coarse ground of Death Wish Coffee, fill the coffee cylinder, add cold water while smushing and stirring the coffee bean mush (make sure to get it nice and saturated so you get all those grinded beans!)Then set in the refrigerator for 12+ hours (emphasis on the plus if you like your cold brew nice and strong) and it’s ready to serve! And since it’s so strong you can dilute it more with your favorite syrups and creamers and still taste the coffee, so the 6 cups go a long way!
